actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 4940 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to change the excise tax on the investment income of private foundations from four percent to two percent.

summary.text: Decreases the excise tax imposed on each private foundation which is exempt from taxation under the Internal Revenue Code from four percent to two percent of the net investment income of such foundation.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 4940 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to change the excise tax on the investment income of private foundations from four percent to two percent.
